channel.title: Help please, dont laugh at me you will be punished
channel.description:
your talking to a guy that is more of a visual learner, so i was wondering where i could learn the folowing subjests in great deatail and still be able to read it from an idiot's point of view. If you are really nice and have the time please msn me. im on gmt -8 usually 5:00-8:30 pm ahem......
Scar scripting
Html<like making the click here things>
Beginner Java
If you post in a good manner, thank you for your time. Ifyou flame/ be rude, you wasted your time

item.title: Help please, dont laugh at me you will be punished
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Thabest:

I don’t see how having A.D.D would affect you when learning java

Because he can’t keep his attention on it maybe? Actually learning a programming language would be very hard with A.D.D I bet. You’d have to have an amazingly strong interest in it, otherwise the entire time you’ll be playing games or listening to music etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, dont laugh at me you will be punished
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Weibs, post:12, topic:24883”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=37612.msg457249#msg457249 date=1163493237]
For java, I have been reading a tutorials off of Pwnd’s site, and I have already learned a lot. http://www.tuts.pwnds.info/downloads/Java%20A%20Beginner’s%20Guide,%20Third%20Edition.pdf
[/quote]

There’s not much visual learning in that.[/quote]Yeah but it’s an extremely long good ebook on java, and should teach him some things.
